name: DVD Simulator (BmoneyDC)
description:
Welcome to DVD Simulator

Have you ever wondered how often that bouncing icon reaches the corner?

Wonder no More!

In DVD Simulator you can fulfill all your DVD fantasies. 

You wanna see the icon move at Moch 4? 

You wanna see 200 hundred little icons moving around? 

You wanna do both?

Well you better have a good computer for the last one,

but now you can!

And of course, thank you for downloading
